abstract.text: Sends a message to players in a game session.

inlineContent.text: For real-time matches, use GKMatchmakerViewController. For turn-based matches, use GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewController.

inlineContent.text: A localized string with format tokens.
An array containing entries for the format tokens contained by the
parameter.
A
object containing a limited amount of developer determined game information.
A
array containing the players to be messaged.
A
indicating whether players are badged when the message is sent.
A block that is called after the message has been sent.
If an error occurred, this parameter holds an error object that explains the error. Otherwise, the value of this parameter is nil. See
for a list of error codes specific to GameKit.
error

abstract.text: Enable players to interact with friends, compare leaderboard ranks, earn achievements, and participate in multiplayer games.
The object representing the currently signed-in iCloud user.
A game session you can use to save game data, invite other players, and create turn-based and real-time game apps.
An array containing all of the currently badged players.
Clears the badge from the designated players.
Sends a message to players in a game session.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
A value type whose instances are either `true` or `false`.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
A type representing an error value that can be thrown.
